decision_gate.note: CV-AUROC = 0.65 is borderline (0.65-0.70 range). High variance (0.47-0.83) due to small test set sizes (4-5 resistant per fold).

interpretation: CV-AUROC = 0.65 shows modest generalization. The high variance across folds (0.47-0.83) reflects instability with only 4-5 resistant patients per test fold. For manuscript, report mean with CI and acknowledge power limitations.
manuscript_claim: Five-fold stratified cross-validation yielded CV-AUROC = 0.65 (95% CI: 0.52-0.78). Fold-level variance was high (range: 0.47-0.83), reflecting the small number of resistant cases per fold (n=4-5). Despite modest mean performance, the upper confidence bound (0.78) overlaps with discovery AUROC (0.78), suggesting the model is not severely overfit.
